title: Grid Wars 2**FIXED**MAC
description:
Grid Wars 2 FIXED!

Works great on my Macbook Pro 10.5.6

Just unzip, open folder and click the Grid Wars 2 icon. Enjoy!!

- Haymose


This is a Mac clone of the game Geometry Wars. It's a bright, flashy, and fun vector-graphics shooter, vaguely reminiscent of Asteroids- if you played Asteroids while tripping acid. ;D

  <a href="
http://img34.picoodle.com/img/img34/3/8/4/f_gw1m_8d791bd.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://img34.picoodle.com/img/img34/3/8/4/f_gw1m_8d791bd.jpg</a>


For an (overly) in-depth analysis of the game, visit http://worldofstuart.excellentcontent.com/grid/wars.htm

This game is for Mac OS X and is written for the PPC processor, but runs fine on Intel Macs (tested on a Macbook Pro with 10.4.11). Leopard compatibility is untested. It was originally released as a free game, but when Geometry Wars (the original) started getting too popular, the programmer was forced to take the clone off his site- I just managed to grab it from a random site still hosting it

-Shrak
